prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a muscular young woman, chaotic spiked black and green hair, large green Potara earrings, red crop top and leggings, realistic muscle definition, arrogant smirk
feature_prompt: individual hair strands visible, detailed fabric texture, sharp focus on green earrings
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, plastic texture, smooth skin, low quality, helmet hair, flat color
